Description: Stores customer information including contact details, address, and preferences
Country code for primary phone number (e.g., +965)
Country code for alternate phone number
Stores order information including status, payment, pricing, and delivery details
Current workflow stage of the order
Enum Values: FATOURA RECEIVED, WATER, BROVA ON PRODUCTION, BROVA AT SHOP WAITING APPROVAL, BROVA OK, BROVA OK + ALT, FINAL ON PRODUCTION, FINAL + BROVA AT SHOP, ALTERATION, CANCELLED

Description: Type of order (work order or sales order)
Number of fabric pieces in order
Stores customer body measurements for custom tailoring
Top pocket distance from collar in cm
Side pocket distance from waist in cm
Side pocket opening size in cm
Stores fabric selection and style options for each garment piece in an order
Current production workflow stage of the garment piece
Enum Values: WAITING CUT, CUTT, POST CUT, TASK1: PREP, TASK2: JABZOUR+FRONT POCKET, TASK3: COLLAR, TASK4: SLEEVES+SIDES+HEMMING SLEEVES, TASK5: INTERMEDIATE OUT1+MEASURE, TASK6: SIDE POCKET+HEMMING, FINISHING, IRONING, QC OK

Description: Reference to fabric record (if IN source)
Name of external fabric shop (if OUT source)
Length of fabric required in meters
Stores fabric inventory with stock and pricing information
Stores ready-made products available on shelves for direct sale
Stores promotional campaigns and special offers
Stores employee information for order tracking and assignments
Stores style option pricing and stitching information for garment customization
Unique style option code (e.g., COL_JAPANESE, STY_KUWAITI)
Category of style option (e.g., Collar, Cuff, Jabzour, Style)
